trans-unit.source: Handles the XML elements used to configure serialization by the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer" />.
trans-unit.target: Manipula os elementos XML usados para configurar a serialização pelo <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer" />.

trans-unit.source: This class is used to handle the [<dataContractSerializer>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) within the [<dataContractSerializer>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) element, specifically, to allow the addition of types to the collection of known types.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada para manipular o [ <dataContractSerializer> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) dentro de [ <dataContractSerializer> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) elemento, especificamente para permitir a adição de tipos para a coleção de tipos conhecidos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.TypeElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.TypeElement" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.TypeElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.TypeElement" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the type that uses known types.
trans-unit.target: O nome do tipo que usa tipos conhecidos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.TypeElement" /> class with the specified type name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.TypeElement" /> com o nome do tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a posição do elemento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.ParameterElementCollection" /> that contains the parameters for the type.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.ParameterElementCollection" /> que contém os parâmetros para o tipo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do tipo.
